name: Leah's Closet 3.0
description: Hello everyone! My name is Leah and I'm so excited to welcome you to my closet. I love playing dress up and today, I need your help to find the perfect outfit. We're going to have so much fun learning about colors, letters, shapes, and more. And the best part? You'll earn diamonds as you answer questions and dress me up. The diamonds can be used to buy more clothing and accessories. But we have to be careful and make sure I'm dressed appropriately for each event or situation. The more happy I am with my outfit, the more my heart meter will fill up. Are you ready to play? Let's get started!
